con:testSuite.name: TestSuite-DEV-CAMT54
con:testSuite.con:description: Contains all required test-case for create camt054 files and execute all required task by drc for processing files

con:property.con:name: CAMT54-Header
con:property.con:value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:camt.054.001.02" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <BkToCstmrDbtCdtNtfctn> <GrpHdr> <MsgId>CTX${Run-GetData#YYYYMMddHHmmssSSS}01</MsgId> <CreDtTm>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</CreDtTm> <MsgRcpt> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm> <PstlAdr> <AdrLine>Postpoint 24 OG rechts</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorStreet}</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorCity}</AdrLine> </PstlAdr> </MsgRcpt> <MsgPgntn> <PgNb>1</PgNb> <LastPgInd>true</LastPgInd> </MsgPgntn> <AddtlInf>Überweisung oder Rücklastschrift</AddtlInf> </GrpHdr> <Ntfctn> <Id>00000000${#Project#DateTime_Current_String_yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS}${Run-GetData#Random5}</Id> <ElctrncSeqNb>${Run-GetData#Random3}</ElctrncSeqNb> <CreDtTm>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</CreDtTm> <Acct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> <Ccy>EUR</Ccy> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorName}</Nm> <Ownr> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm> <PstlAdr> <AdrLine>Postpoint 24 OG rechts</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorStreet}</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorCity}</AdrLine> </PstlAdr> </Ownr> <Svcr> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-BIC}</BIC> <Nm>UNICREDIT BANK AG</Nm> <Othr> <Id>DE129273380</Id> <Issr>UmsStId</Issr> </Othr> </FinInstnId> </Svcr> </Acct> <Ntry> <Amt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#TotalAmount}</Amt> <CdtDbtInd>${#TestCase#Type}</CdtDbtInd> <Sts>BOOK</Sts> <BookgDt> <DtTm>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</DtTm> </BookgDt> <ValDt> <DtTm>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</DtTm> </ValDt> <BkTxCd> <Domn> <Cd>PMNT</Cd> <Fmly> <Cd>RCDT</Cd> <SubFmlyCd>ESCT</SubFmlyCd> </Fmly> </Domn> <Prtry> <Cd>NTRF+194+100</Cd> <Issr>ZKA</Issr> </Prtry> </BkTxCd> <NtryDtls> <Btch> <MsgId>CTX${Run-GetData#YYYYMMddHHmmssSSS}01</MsgId> <NbOfTxs>${#TestCase#Count}</NbOfTxs> <TtlAmt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#TotalAmount}</TtlAmt> <CdtDbtInd>${#TestCase#Type}</CdtDbtInd> </Btch>

con:property.con:name: CAMT54-Header-Bankday
con:property.con:value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:camt.054.001.02" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <BkToCstmrDbtCdtNtfctn> <GrpHdr> <MsgId>CTX${Run-GetData#YYYYMMddHHmmssSSS}01</MsgId> <CreDtTm>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</CreDtTm> <MsgRcpt> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm> <PstlAdr> <AdrLine>Postpoint 24 OG rechts</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorStreet}</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorCity}</AdrLine> </PstlAdr> </MsgRcpt> <MsgPgntn> <PgNb>1</PgNb> <LastPgInd>true</LastPgInd> </MsgPgntn> <AddtlInf>Überweisung oder Rücklastschrift</AddtlInf> </GrpHdr> <Ntfctn> <Id>00000000${#Project#DateTime_Current_String_yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS}${Run-GetData#Random5}</Id> <ElctrncSeqNb>${Run-GetData#Random3}</ElctrncSeqNb> <CreDtTm>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</CreDtTm> <Acct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> <Ccy>EUR</Ccy> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorName}</Nm> <Ownr> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm> <PstlAdr> <AdrLine>Postpoint 24 OG rechts</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorStreet}</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorCity}</AdrLine> </PstlAdr> </Ownr> <Svcr> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-BIC}</BIC> <Nm>UNICREDIT BANK AG</Nm> <Othr> <Id>DE129273380</Id> <Issr>UmsStId</Issr> </Othr> </FinInstnId> </Svcr> </Acct> <Ntry> <Amt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#TotalAmount}</Amt> <CdtDbtInd>${#TestCase#Type}</CdtDbtInd> <Sts>BOOK</Sts> <BookgDt> <DtTm>${#TestCase#BankDay_DateTime}</DtTm> </BookgDt> <ValDt> <DtTm>${#TestCase#BankDay_DateTime}</DtTm> </ValDt> <BkTxCd> <Domn> <Cd>PMNT</Cd> <Fmly> <Cd>RCDT</Cd> <SubFmlyCd>ESCT</SubFmlyCd> </Fmly> </Domn> <Prtry> <Cd>NTRF+194+100</Cd> <Issr>ZKA</Issr> </Prtry> </BkTxCd> <NtryDtls> <Btch> <MsgId>CTX${Run-GetData#YYYYMMddHHmmssSSS}01</MsgId> <NbOfTxs>${#TestCase#Count}</NbOfTxs> <TtlAmt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#TotalAmount}</TtlAmt> <CdtDbtInd>${#TestCase#Type}</CdtDbtInd> </Btch>

con:property.con:name: CAMT54-Credit-Middle
con:property.con:value: <TxDtls> <Refs> <EndToEndId>ZV${Run-GetData#String20}01</EndToEndId> <TxId>CTC${Run-GetData#String20}0002</TxId> </Refs> <AmtDtls> <TxAmt> <Amt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#Amount}</Amt> </TxAmt> </AmtDtls> <BkTxCd> <Domn> <Cd>PMNT</Cd> <Fmly> <Cd>RCDT</Cd> <SubFmlyCd>ESCT</SubFmlyCd> </Fmly> </Domn> <Prtry> <Cd>NTRF+166+100</Cd> <Issr>ZKA</Issr> </Prtry> </BkTxCd> <RltdPties> <Dbtr> <Nm>${Run-GetData#Name} - Testüberweisung CAMT54 Credit</Nm> </Dbtr> <DbtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> </DbtrAcct> <Cdtr> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm> </Cdtr> <CdtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> </CdtrAcct> </RltdPties> <RltdAgts> <DbtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#Customer-BIC}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </DbtrAgt> <CdtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-BIC}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </CdtrAgt> </RltdAgts> <RmtInf> <Ustrd>${#TestCase#MSISDN}-${#TestCase#CheckCode} DRC Testaufladung. Credit</Ustrd> </RmtInf> <AddtlTxInf>SEPA-Gutschrift</AddtlTxInf> </TxDtls>

con:property.con:name: CAMT54-Debit-Middle
con:property.con:value: <TxDtls> <Refs> <InstrId>InstrId${Run-GetData#String20}</InstrId> <EndToEndId>${#TestCase#EndToEndID}</EndToEndId> <TxId>TxId${Run-GetData#String20}</TxId> <MndtId>MndtId${Run-GetData#String20}</MndtId> </Refs> <AmtDtls> <InstdAmt> <Amt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#Amount}</Amt> </InstdAmt> <TxAmt> <Amt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#Amount+Fee}</Amt> </TxAmt> <PrtryAmt> <Tp>IBS</Tp> <Amt Ccy="EUR">1.99</Amt> </PrtryAmt> </AmtDtls> <BkTxCd> <Domn> <Cd>PMNT</Cd> <Fmly> <Cd>IDDT</Cd> <SubFmlyCd>UPDD</SubFmlyCd> </Fmly> </Domn> <Prtry> <Cd>NRTI+109+100</Cd> <Issr>DK</Issr> </Prtry> </BkTxCd> <Chrgs> <Amt Ccy="EUR">${#TestCase#Fee}</Amt> <Tp> <Prtry> <Id>Fremdentgelt</Id> </Prtry> </Tp> <Pty> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#Customer-BIC}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </Pty> </Chrgs> <RltdPties> <Dbtr> <Nm>${Run-GetData#Name} - Testüberweisung CAMT54 Debit</Nm> </Dbtr> <DbtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> </DbtrAcct> <Cdtr> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorName}</Nm> <PstlAdr> <Ctry>DE</Ctry> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorStreet}</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorCity}</AdrLine> </PstlAdr> <Id> <PrvtId> <Othr> <Id>DE9700000000142${Run-GetData#Random3}2</Id> </Othr> </PrvtId> </Id> </Cdtr> <CdtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> </CdtrAcct> </RltdPties> <RltdAgts> <DbtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#Customer-BIC}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </DbtrAgt> <CdtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-BIC}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </CdtrAgt> </RltdAgts> <RmtInf> <Ustrd>Test Aufladung für MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN} + Check-code is not relevant. ${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorName} SAGT DANKE</Ustrd> </RmtInf> <RtrInf> <Rsn> <Cd>${#TestCase#ReasonCode}</Cd> </Rsn> <AddtlInf>RETURN/REFUND Kein gültiges Mandat</AddtlInf> </RtrInf> <AddtlTxInf>SEPA Reject</AddtlTxInf> </TxDtls>
